newsitem.title: UK: Siebe wins orders worth over 150 mln stg.
newsitem.headline: Siebe wins orders worth over 150 mln stg.

text.p: International engineering group Siebe Plc said on Wednesday it has won new orders for its industrial control systems worth over 150 million stg.
It said the orders were taken internationally from customers across the chemical, oil, gas, power and semiconductor industries.

The company said that despite the recent softness in some industrial control market segments, it was continuing to win business with major project orders for its control systems now up 30 percent this year.
